Prebons sensors show two incoming missles, he fires two of his own to inter=
cept them. the missles collide sending shrapnel in both directions, Prebon =
covers his face to protect himself from any serious harm. Shards of metal c=
ut into the Trainer leader but it's nothing his internal repairs couldn't h=
andle. the other debris strikes the shields causing it to flicker. Prebon f=
ires five shots from his constrictor rifle at Godfather and another three a=
t Sharpedge.

(A constrictor rifle fires beams of energy that wrap themselv=
es around whatever they hit and squeeze until either the beam touches the o=
ther side or id runs out of energy.)

----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, January 07, 20=
01 4:18 PM
  Subject: Healing and Fighting


  :::Starscream/Sharpedge/Godf=
ather::: 

  ::Starscream reaches the base and walks in. He puts Dollen in =
a CR chamber, 
  transforms back to jet mode and heads back to the battle::=
 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Sharpedge and Godfather are fully healed, and they emerge fr=
om there CR 
  chambers:: 
  Sharpedge: Come on! Lets get back to the battl=
e at the CF! 
  ::Theyt walk out and realize that there is a battle going o=
n:: 
  Sharpedge: We might as well stay here. 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Sharpedge fires=
 2 missles at Prebon:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Godfather fires 15 shots from each gun=
 at Slayer:: 
        eGroups Sponsor
